definition: to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: An afebrile elderly woman who suffered from left flank pain for 1 month visited the emergency department for help.
sentences.chinese: 一位體溫正常老婦人因左腰痛一個月到急診部門求醫。

sentences.english: The joy of becoming a mother wiped from Lin Yueh-hui's memory all the torments of the medical process.
sentences.chinese: 爲人母的喜悅，已使林月惠忘卻求醫過程所受的折磨。

sentences.english: After hard work, the wood to the doctor arrived in nine marder church place a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 幾經辛勞，柴九才抵達白朗大夫的教堂處求醫。

sentences.english: Doctor cures for mother, even broken foot of punishment is fearless.
sentences.chinese: 爲了替母親求醫治病，竟然連斷足之刑也無所畏懼了。

sentences.english: When should someone seek medical care?
Even then, it is only given to those who are sick and are seeking services.
sentences.chinese: 即便進行衛生教育，也只針對患病和求醫者。

sentences.english: Ann apple a day keeps the doctor away.
sentences.chinese: 一日一個蘋果，身體翌健康不求醫。

sentences.english: S46:If swallowed, seek medical advice immediately and show this container or label.
sentences.chinese: 若不慎吞食，立即求醫並出示其容器或標籤。

sentences.english: It's best to let a doctor diagnose a respiratory infection rather than self-administerantibiotics on a hunch.
sentences.chinese: 最好是求醫診斷而不要憑預感自己給藥抗生素之類的。

sentences.english: S46If swallowed, seek medical advice immediately and show this container or label.
sentences.chinese: 若不慎吞食，立即求醫並出示其容器或標籤。

sentences.english: Enhancing the care-seeking behaviour of pregnant women is required in addition to increasing service provision.
sentences.chinese: 爲了提高服務供給，加強孕婦的求醫行爲也是需要的。

sentences.english: Pay attention to skin health, they should immediately seek medical attention if rash.
sentences.chinese: 健康方面要留意皮膚病，如有紅疹便要馬上求醫。

sentences.english: Therefore in many cases they first approach the private sector for health services.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在許多情況下，她們首先是去私立部門求醫。

sentences.english: He told the doctor the truth and the reason for his visit.
sentences.chinese: 於是就跟醫生說了實話，也說了他來求醫的原因。

sentences.english: I'm the slave who is sick of his sins and now i come searching for doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我就是那個僕人，因罪惡而生病，求醫問藥的人。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
(of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
